basics.label: Business Development Consultant
basics.summary: Dynamic financial services and business development leader with 17+ years of combined experience across diverse banking and sales platforms. Dedicated to delivering services excellence while surpassing revenue objectives, working closely with teams and clients to address needs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Delivered expert consulting services in financing, operations, sales, and marketing.
highlights: Secured up to 50 new clients monthly.
Developed and implemented process improvement plans based on client feedback and operational monitoring.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Spearheaded new business development, leading turnaround of under-performing product lines to achieve objectives.
highlights: Improved bottom line profit by securing business from up to 40 new clients monthly.
Orchestrated diversification of offerings, increasing sales via new product launches.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinated talented team of 8 committed to development and retention of profitable client base.
highlights: Boosted loan and deposit rates while elevating branch to highest performer in customer satisfaction scores.
Applied expertise in Fiserv, Business Process Manager, Ultipro, Taleo, Continuity Control, Connections, Applink, and MortgageBot tools.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed and administered consumer and real estate loan operations across various offices.
highlights: Drove smooth transition of newly-acquired Smith County State Bank and Trust Department - consolidating team of 30+.
Provided staff leadership, evaluations, salary adjustments, interviews, and hiring.

courses: The Peoples Bank annual leadership training program
